# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

set( MODULE_NAME "ProjectGen" )
add_library( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefCORE gucefMT )
target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} gucefCORE gucefMT )
set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "GUCEF_PROJECTGEN_BUILD_MODULE" )

include_directories( ../../common/include ../../platform/gucefCORE/include ../../platform/gucefMT/include include )

if ( ANDROID )

endif( ANDROID )

  include_directories( ../../platform/gucefCORE/include/linux )
endif( LINUX32 )

endif( LINUX64 )

  include_directories( ../../platform/gucefCORE/include/mswin )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )

endif( WIN64 )
